events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. This is quite disappointing.
The issue has been classified under the refund cluster due to customer's request for money back.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah for further handling and customer support.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. Attached is a photo showing the item I received does not match the description.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the hassle-free process and look forward to the refund.
We have processed your refund and emailed you the shipping label for returning the incorrect item. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully and if everything is satisfactory now.
Since your issue has been resolved and you confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey about your recent refund experience.
